thread.title: Sonam Kapoor's Austrian holiday will make you feel the winter chills! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor's Austrian holiday will make you feel the winter chills! | Zee News

title: Sonam Kapoor's Austrian holiday will make you feel the winter chills! | Zee News
text:
Sonam Kapoor's Austrian holiday will make you feel the winter chills! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 20:15 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood diva Sonam Kapoor and her sister Rhea Kapoor are reportedly bonding big time in Austria these days. And, now, the 31-year-old actress has made her fans go green with envy by sharing some of the candid pictures online from her vacation. 
From snow-clad mountains to exotic sceneries, the 'Mausam' star is having the time of her life and we are simply lovin' it. Some of the images are so beautiful that they look like a fairytale affair. See for yourself: 
Jealous much? 
On the cinema front, Sonam is currently enjoying the success of her latest release 'Neerja'. She is also working on her upcoming movie 'Veerey Di Wedding'. MUST READ 
The flick will feature Kareena Kapoor Khan and Swara Bhaskar in key roles. It is expected to go on the floors pretty soon. First Published: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 13:09 More from zeenews
